artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Author: Music by Claude Terrasse; Author: Lyrics by Maurice Étienne Legrand, called Franc-Nohain; Publisher: Edition du Mercure de France, Paris , for the Répertoire des pantins
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Illustrated sheet music for a song from the Répertoire des pantins (Theater des Pantins), a puppet theater founded in Paris in 1898 by Alfred Jarry, Franc-Nohain, and Claude Terrasse; 6 pp.
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. given to MIA, 1991.
title: Berceuse obsene
